document.full_text: one of the most riveting final rounds at the masters left tiger woods and rory mcilroy dealing with bitter disappointment on monday, although they each appear to have bright prospects going forward.
document.title: woods, mcilroy set to flourish after augusta woes
lines_and_colors: one of the most riveting final rounds at the masters left tiger woods and rory mcilroy dealing with bitter disappointment on monday, although they each appear to have bright prospects going forward.
